summary: Simple .bat file setting all skills levels to 0. & The maximum probability of pickpocketing is changed to 100%.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Mod feature
1. Change all skill values to zero.
2. The maximum probability of pickpocketing is changed to 100%. 

Pickpocketing normally maxes out at a 90% chance meaning you always have a 10% chance of failure.
This mod changes the maximum probability to 100%. This does not make pickpocketing easier.


Install / Uninstall / Compatibility.
To install and use, simply copy the file into the skyrim folder, launch the game, open the console using the [²], [~] or [¬] Key depending on your keyboard and write:  "bat one"
To uninstall, simply delete the .txt file from your Skyrim folder.

directory:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim (default)

compatibility
Since this use basic console commands, this should have a 100% compatibility with every mods.[/size][/font]
author: tiramii
